PRODUCT_NAME: 2019 HP 15.6 Inch HD Premium Business Laptop PC, Intel Dual-core i3-7100U, 8GB DDR4 RAM, 1TB HDD, USB 3.1, HDMI, WiFi, Bluetooth, Windows 10, W/ Legendary Computer Backpack & Mouse Pad Bundle

REVIEW #1.title: 4GB RAM NOT 8GB RAM!
REVIEW #1.content: This is NOT an 8GB RAM! It is only 4GB RAM! With that being said, it is advertised as an 8GB RAM, packaging was basically triple boxes, packaged very well! Came with backpack and mouse pad as described. Initial start up was slow, but moving fast now that it’s set up. Only gave 3 stars because the RAM is a significant part in purchasing the right laptop!
REVIEW #1.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2019
REVIEW #1.author: Atara83

REVIEW #2.title: Great Laptop, Good Value, well worth it
REVIEW #2.content: Amazon delivered my order promptly. This laptop bundle came in a solid double packaging, and it comes with a backpack and a mouse pad. I am so amazed by the backpack & mouse pad quality, and I don’t mind the little legendary logo both accessories. I had HP laptops previously and had been pleased with their performance. This one is exceptional for someone who isn't into a lot of gaming and such. I am self employed and I bought this laptop for my work, I only need basic internet browsing and need to do some basic excel reporting, so this computer is perfect for me and at an amazing price, especially it came with bonus accessories.
REVIEW #2.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2019
REVIEW #2.author: Maggie

REVIEW #3.title: Nice, but faulty!
REVIEW #3.content: I got a faulty laptop from day 1! Before I ordered I made sure to ask the seller if it’s NEW.  Well, I got it and it shuts down every 2 minutes. They offered refund, but I live outside the US and returning this mess will cost me a lot. I thought it was tested/upgraded as stated. How can they missed mines when it shuts off right after start up?  Now I’ve trust issues with purchasing electronics online now.
REVIEW #3.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2019
REVIEW #3.author: Candice

REVIEW #4.title: Pretty much everything that i was looking for in a large laptop
REVIEW #4.content: the box delivered on time and safe.  it was double boxed and packed well. the included laptop bag is good quality and will work well when i need to use it.  i would not buy this laptop for the bag but it is a nice value add. speed and response on this laptop is everything that i was looking for.  set up was easy and came 1/2 charged so i didn't have to immediately plug in. My only concern is battery life.  this is the largest laptop that i have ever had.  i use mainly for school and work.  i don't game or stream a lot of video.  but in the 4 hours that i have had the laptop open today, the battery has already dropped to 25%.  i don't know if that is to be expected with the multiple windows open and the large screen but i don't expect to get 8 hours out of the charge if i am on it.  I will keep the power cable near by.  if you are using less, you might make a full day on a charge.
REVIEW #4.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2019
REVIEW #4.author: Gregg Stepp

REVIEW #5.title: Nice laptop
REVIEW #5.content: Nice looking laptop. Very light. Quality is very good and very happy with this purchase. Got this laptop earlier than expected. Highly recommended seller and a product!
REVIEW #5.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2019
REVIEW #5.author: T. Khadu

REVIEW #6.title: Excellent
REVIEW #6.content: Excellent computer, pretty easy setup, excellent quality backpack. I’d recommend this to anyone looking for a good computer at an affordable price.
REVIEW #6.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2019
REVIEW #6.author: Megs77

REVIEW #7.title: Nice laptop bundle
REVIEW #7.content: It is an amazing back to school laptop bundle, HP laptop is fast and portable for my school study, and the backpack looks awesome. Overall, it is worth every penny. Thanks
REVIEW #7.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2019
REVIEW #7.author: Amazon Customer

REVIEW #8.title: To be happy!!
REVIEW #8.content: I have nothing to say because since I opened the Laptop, already was defected.  I was very disappointed that the next day I have to return it.  However, AMAZON, customer services took care this issue.  Amazon has so many customer services over sea like Filipinas that I was very happy how those tech support help you. Since, the price is so good, I decided to re buy it.
REVIEW #8.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2019
REVIEW #8.author: Jorge

REVIEW #9.title: Works great for my needs!!!
REVIEW #9.content: I really needed a good reliable cost effective laptop....and this is perfect.  I read the reviews and check other laptop that were Comparable.  This was exactly what I needed.  I can watch movies, read, you tube play some games... oh and yes work too!!!  Love the quality of it and the ease of using it. I would recommend it!!!
REVIEW #9.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2020
REVIEW #9.author: KR

REVIEW #10.title: Works very good.
REVIEW #10.content: Nothing to dislike about it. Nice laptop for the price.
REVIEW #10.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2019
REVIEW #10.author: Robert C

REVIEW #11.title: Awesome so far
REVIEW #11.content: Awesome so far. Super easy step by step set up and really fast. Nice size and it looks great. Nice secure packaging and fast shipping.
REVIEW #11.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2019
REVIEW #11.author: Bunnyf68

REVIEW #12.title: clunky key board
REVIEW #12.content: clunky , flat key action..  so much distracting noise with the clinking and squeaking...  Nothing smooth or pleasant about typing on the keyboard.  Computer works fine,  am below basic user need very little, so I can't comment on ability for not needing too much ability .  need basic for average task and getting around this computer does just fine.
REVIEW #12.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2020
REVIEW #12.author: P. Cassidy

REVIEW #13.title: Grreat service and support!
REVIEW #13.content: I use this product for my home and personal use. Everything was boxed properly and all items were included. Thumbs up! Thank you!!!!!
REVIEW #13.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2019
REVIEW #13.author: Charles Wayne Davis

REVIEW #14.title: Computer Came in with bad battery
REVIEW #14.content: Don't trust the Amazon storage and handling process for electronics.  My recent printer purchase and this computer both came in with defects that require fixing before fully working.  Reviews of Amazon electronic products found similar experiences of other buyers.  Makes me less likely to buy something computerized from Amazon--concerned they store stuff and handle electronics without proper care causing some of these issues.  This computer had a defective battery.  Is Amazon getting lower prices at the expense of quality?
REVIEW #14.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2020
REVIEW #14.author: David G. Moore

REVIEW #15.title: 4GB not 8GB system memory
REVIEW #15.content: The product is advertised as 8GB DDR4 system memory but it’s actually 4GB I’m not returning the laptop but I feel lied to 😐
REVIEW #15.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2020
REVIEW #15.author: raza

REVIEW #16.title: The computer tutorials along with "Cortana" open doors some of us never imagined...
REVIEW #16.content: This is my first computer. I wasn't sure what to expect but I do know that I was not prepared for what was in that carefully wrapped package. I chose a business computer because of the reviews, herein, which spoke to how you get so much more at a better price and with less fluff...what an understatement, that was! Between the excellent tutorials, "Cortana," various upgrades, and a machine that seems almost intuitive when it comes to offering just what you need-for free-right when you needed it, I was almost overwhelmed with the creative possibilities so much so that I still can't get this grin off of my face! 😁😁😁
REVIEW #16.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2020
REVIEW #16.author: Joseph R.

REVIEW #17.title: Lasted a Year
REVIEW #17.content: From day 1, I struggled with issues. Some days, the laptop would just shut off on its own, other days it would take an update and never start up and then there were days it would give me the blue screen of death. This laptop is cheaply made with buggy software and a strange temperament.  To make matters worse, the WIFI card died in just 11 months so I could no longer access the internet without an ethernet cable. I bought an Acer to replace it. I am hoping for better luck.
REVIEW #17.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2020
REVIEW #17.author: Garry W

REVIEW #18.title: Great specs
REVIEW #18.content: It was a great oprion to gift. Looking at the specs and based on the intended use, it was the best option I had ASAP. Delivery was rather fast too.
REVIEW #18.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2020
REVIEW #18.author: eve

REVIEW #19.title: Excellant Laptop!
REVIEW #19.content: Very Easy set-up. very good design! I love it!
REVIEW #19.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2019
REVIEW #19.author: Helen

REVIEW #20.title: Frustrating...
REVIEW #20.content: I thought I was getting a good little laptop for a decent price but it doesn't stay on.  Often shutting down while in use.
REVIEW #20.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2020
REVIEW #20.author: NaniOf7

REVIEW #21.title: Great buy!
REVIEW #21.content: Writing updated review. Product is great!!!
REVIEW #21.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2019
REVIEW #21.author: Eva m.

REVIEW #22.title: The best computer ever,I recommend this seller 100%sure
REVIEW #22.content: I recommend this seller,this laptop is really good and it works pretty well for the price,no lag and really flat like a mac,and the seller did not take anytime to send me the package,i receive it earlier than expected.If you guys need a computer,check this seller for quality and better result for your money...
REVIEW #22.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2020
REVIEW #22.author: Josué BERNARDD01-100915

REVIEW #23.title: No me gustó mucho
REVIEW #23.content: No me agrado que no estuviera sellada le faltó la cinta de seguridad de la parte de abajo, se mira la carcasa como las laptop de hace años no se mira moderna es muy simple su estructura no parece modelo 2019
REVIEW #23.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2019
REVIEW #23.author: Israel Hp

REVIEW #24.title: Internet connectivity a hassle
REVIEW #24.content: So far so good for the most bbn part. Just don't like that I have to reset modems or have the code to connect to the wifi. I'm used to just signing in. (A hassle when I take it places with me.)
REVIEW #24.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2019
REVIEW #24.author: Marilyn Johnson

REVIEW #25.title: laptop low quality
REVIEW #25.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2020
REVIEW #25.author: Amazon Customer

REVIEW #26.title: Not worth it. Spend some more on a better computer
REVIEW #26.content: Very cheap material. Surprise HP but their brand on this product. Slow processor too. If you lack of patience using a computer, do not buy, u will want to throw it out the window because is slow!
REVIEW #26.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2019
REVIEW #26.author: Rolando Conde

REVIEW #27.title: Reliable and fast
REVIEW #27.content: Like the capacity and speed Personal use
REVIEW #27.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2019
REVIEW #27.author: Munir Simon

REVIEW #28.title: Came in one piece
REVIEW #28.content: Well, I saw mouse pad bundle thinking a mouse was included. They can just say mouse pad and not mention bundle. It was miss leading. A computer without an operating system again is a let down. I like the back pack.
REVIEW #28.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2020
REVIEW #28.author: Amazon Customer

REVIEW #29.title: Battery didn't work
REVIEW #29.content: Battery had absolutely no power.  Unfortunately son did not tell us it never worked until 5 months after purchase.  Buying a spare off of amazon.  Bit of a disappointment.
REVIEW #29.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2020
REVIEW #29.author: Dawn Bellonzi

REVIEW #30.title: Excelente computador!
REVIEW #30.content: Buena inversió (poca), por un excelente producto del proveedor!
REVIEW #30.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2020
REVIEW #30.author: Farid
